tool_description: Generates comprehensive volatility monitoring and risk management performance reports with visualizations and insights.

report_period_start.description: Report period start date in ISO 8601 format

report_period_end.description: Report period end date in ISO 8601 format

symbols.description: Symbols to include in the report

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date.
Date format error: Dates must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
No symbols specified: At least one symbol must be provided for reporting.
Invalid report format: Use one of [summary, detailed, executive].
usage: Provide report_period_start, report_period_end, and symbols array. Optionally set include_charts and report_format preferences.

chart_descriptions.description: Descriptions of key charts and visualizations
